verses.verse: And the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4100>Why<s%> have you <S%H6213>served<s%> us <S%H1697>thus,<s%> <S%H2007><s%> that you <S%H7121>called<s%> us not, <S%H3588>when<s%> you <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with the <S%H4080>Midianites?<s%> And they did <S%H7378>chide<s%> with him <S%H2394>sharply.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H4100>What<s%> have I <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> in comparison of you? Is not the <S%H5955>gleaning<s%> of the grapes of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H2896>better<s%> than the <S%H1210>vintage<s%> of <S%H44>Abiezer?<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into your <S%H3027>hands<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> <S%H6157>Oreb<s%> and <S%H2062>Zeeb:<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> was I <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> in comparison of you? <S%H227>Then<s%> their <S%H7307>anger<s%> was <S%H7503>abated<s%> toward him, when he had <S%H1696>said<s%> that.

And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>over,<s%> he, and the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> that were with him, <S%H5889>faint,<s%> yet <S%H7291>pursuing<s%> them.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth,<s%> <S%H5414>Give,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, <S%H3603>loaves<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H7272>follow<s%> me; for they be <S%H5889>faint,<s%> and I am <S%H7291>pursuing<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna,<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian.<s%>

And the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Are the <S%H3709>hands<s%> of <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> that we should <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> to your <S%H6635>army?<s%>

And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Therefore when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%> into my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> then I will <S%H1758>tear<s%> your <S%H1320>flesh<s%> with the <S%H6975>thorns<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> and with <S%H1303>briers.<s%>

And he <S%H5927>went<s%> up <S%H8033>there<s%> to <S%H6439>Penuel,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to them <S%H2063>likewise:<s%> and the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H6439>Penuel<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> him as the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth<s%> had <S%H6030>answered<s%> him.

And he <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> to the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H6439>Penuel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> When I <S%H7725>come<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> in <S%H7965>peace,<s%> I will <S%H5422>break<s%> <S%H5422>down<s%> this <S%H4026>tower.<s%>

Now <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%> were in <S%H7174>Karkor,<s%> and their <S%H4264>hosts<s%> with them, about <S%H2568>fifteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> men, <S%H3605>all<s%> that were <S%H3498>left<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4264>hosts<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H6924>east:<s%> for there <S%H5307>fell<s%> an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> that <S%H8025>drew<s%> <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of them that <S%H7931>dwelled<s%> in <S%H168>tents<s%> on the <S%H6924>east<s%> of <S%H5025>Nobah<s%> and <S%H3011>Jogbehah,<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H4264>host;<s%> for the <S%H4264>host<s%> was <S%H983>secure.<s%>

And when <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%> <S%H5127>fled,<s%> he <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them, and <S%H3920>took<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna,<s%> and <S%H2729>discomfited<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4264>host.<s%>
And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> from <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H4608>before<s%> the <S%H2775>sun<s%> was up,

And <S%H3920>caught<s%> a <S%H5288>young<s%> man of the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth,<s%> and <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of him: and he <S%H3789>described<s%> to him the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth,<s%> and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> thereof, even three <S%H7657>score<s%> and <S%H7657>seventeen<s%> <S%H7651><s%> <S%H376>men.<s%>

And he <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold<s%> <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna,<s%> with <S%H834>whom<s%> you did <S%H2778>upbraid<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> Are the <S%H3709>hands<s%> of <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> that we should <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> to your <S%H582>men<s%> that are <S%H3286>weary?<s%>

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H6975>thorns<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> and <S%H1303>briers,<s%> and with them he <S%H3045>taught<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth.<s%>
And he <S%H5422>beat<s%> <S%H5422>down<s%> the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H6439>Penuel,<s%> and <S%H2026>slew<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he to <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna,<s%> <S%H375>What<s%> manner of <S%H582>men<s%> were they <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H2026>slew<s%> at <S%H8396>Tabor?<s%> And they <S%H559>answered,<s%> As you are, <S%H1992>so<s%> were they; each <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8389>resembled<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of a <S%H4428>king.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> They were my <S%H251>brothers,<s%> even the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of my <S%H517>mother:<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> <S%H3863>if<s%> you had <S%H2421>saved<s%> them <S%H2421>alive,<s%> I would not <S%H2026>slay<s%> you.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3500>Jether<s%> his <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> Up, and <S%H2026>slay<s%> them. But the <S%H5288>youth<s%> <S%H8025>drew<s%> not his <S%H2719>sword:<s%> for he <S%H3372>feared,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he was <S%H5750>yet<s%> a <S%H5288>youth.<s%>

Then <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6965>Rise<s%> you, and <S%H6293>fall<s%> on us: for as the <S%H376>man<s%> is, so is his <S%H1369>strength.<s%> And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H2026>slew<s%> <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> away the <S%H7720>ornaments<s%> that were on their <S%H1581>camels'<s%> <S%H6677>necks.<s%>

Then the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1439>Gideon,<s%> <S%H4910>Rule<s%> you over us, <S%H1571>both<s%> you, and your <S%H1121>son,<s%> and your <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H1571>also:<s%> for you have <S%H3467>delivered<s%> us from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian.<s%>

And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, I will not <S%H4910>rule<s%> over you, <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H4910>rule<s%> over you: the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H4910>rule<s%> over you.

And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, I would <S%H7592>desire<s%> a <S%H7596>request<s%> of you, that you would <S%H5414>give<s%> me every <S%H376>man<s%> the <S%H5141>earrings<s%> of his <S%H7998>prey.<s%> (For they had <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H5141>earrings,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they were <S%H3459>Ishmaelites.<s%>)

And they <S%H559>answered,<s%> We will <S%H5414>willingly<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> them. And they <S%H6566>spread<s%> a <S%H8071>garment,<s%> and did <S%H7993>cast<s%> <S%H8033>therein<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> the <S%H5141>earrings<s%> of his <S%H7998>prey.<s%>

And the <S%H4948>weight<s%> of the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H5141>earrings<s%> that he <S%H7592>requested<s%> was a <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> shekels of <S%H2091>gold;<s%> <S%H905>beside<s%> <S%H7720>ornaments,<s%> and <S%H5188>collars,<s%> and <S%H713>purple<s%> <S%H899>raiment<s%> that was <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> and <S%H905>beside<s%> the <S%H6060>chains<s%> that were about their <S%H1581>camels'<s%> <S%H6677>necks.<s%>

And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> an <S%H646>ephod<s%> thereof, and <S%H3322>put<s%> it in his <S%H5892>city,<s%> even in <S%H6084>Ophrah:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H8033>thither<s%> a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> it: which thing <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H4170>snare<s%> to <S%H1439>Gideon,<s%> and to his <S%H1004>house.<s%>

Thus was <S%H4080>Midian<s%> <S%H3665>subdued<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> so that they <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up their <S%H7218>heads<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more.<s%> And the <S%H776>country<s%> was in <S%H8252>quietness<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H1439>Gideon.<s%>
And <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in his own <S%H1004>house.<s%>
And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> had three <S%H7657>score<s%> and ten <S%H1121>sons<s%> of his <S%H3409>body<s%> <S%H3318>begotten:<s%> for he <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H802>wives.<s%>

And his <S%H6370>concubine<s%> that was in <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> she <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> him a <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H853>whose<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> he <S%H7760>called<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech.<s%>

And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> in a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7872>old<s%> <S%H7872>age,<s%> and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in the <S%H6913>sepulcher<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> in <S%H6084>Ophrah<s%> of the <S%H33>Abiezrites.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, as <S%H834>soon<s%> as <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> that the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H7725>again,<s%> and went a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1168>Baalim,<s%> and <S%H7760>made<s%> <S%H1170>Baalberith<s%> their <S%H430>god.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> not the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> who had <S%H5337>delivered<s%> them out of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H341>enemies<s%> on <S%H5437>every<s%> <S%H5439>side:<s%>

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> <S%H6213>showed<s%> they <S%H2617>kindness<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3378>Jerubbaal,<s%> namely, <S%H1439>Gideon,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2896>goodness<s%> which he had <S%H6213>showed<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
